- For the seventh row (paris sg and us orléans), the score in the 1st round was different from the score in the 2nd round, so they don't match.
- For the eighth row (stade rennais and anglers sco), the score in the 1st round was different from the score in the 2nd round, so they don't match.

Since there is one pair of teams (olympique de marseille and sporting toulon var) that have the same score in both rounds, the claim is TRUE.
